title: Agnes B.
content: Trying to find this typeface used for the Agnes B. logo. Is this a custom job or a signature? If it is, is there anything around that is similar? ![Agnes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175005im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37555.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content: Did Tiffany's avantar went to the beach and got sunburned? :P
isn't this her signature? i don't think it is a typeface. :^/ but if it is i'll eat my mousepad. ;^)
Nope, she just really loves Belgium now, and who can blame her? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175005im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Well. I do love Belgium, but it is really me waving this year's [TypeCon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175005/http:/www.typecon2004.com/) colors. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175005im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
